name: games played with multiple rate types
description: Test case for games played with multiple rate types
expected_query: with "tffa4ec673b4f60169d1851d9d0099ceb" as (select "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."pid", count(*) as "rate_type_total_count", array_agg(distinct player_gamelogs_year_2023.tm) as teams from "player_gamelogs_year_2023" left join "nfl_games" on "nfl_games"."esbid" = "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."esbid" where "nfl_games"."seas_type" in ('REG') and "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."active" = true and "nfl_games"."year" in (2023) group by "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."pid"), "td7c3e33ca21a03aa3317f8fa7968a99b" as (select "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."pid", count(*) as "rate_type_total_count", array_agg(distinct player_gamelogs_year_2023.tm) as teams from "player_gamelogs_year_2023" left join "nfl_games" on "nfl_games"."esbid" = "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."esbid" where "nfl_games"."seas_type" in ('REG') and "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."active" = true and "nfl_games"."year" in (2023) and "nfl_games"."week" in (1, 2, 3) group by "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."pid"), "t1c3fcb1f32313815df18da7f8e31c3cd" as (select COALESCE(trg_pid) as pid, SUM(CASE WHEN comp = true THEN recv_yds ELSE 0 END) as rec_yds_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2023) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by COALESCE(trg_pid)), "t07addadcba8ab806b865cf1a15960ae2" as (select COALESCE(trg_pid) as pid, SUM(CASE WHEN comp = true THEN recv_yds ELSE 0 END) as rec_yds_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2023) and "nfl_plays"."week" in (1, 2, 3) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by COALESCE(trg_pid)) select "player"."pid", tffa4ec673b4f60169d1851d9d0099ceb.rate_type_total_count as games_played_0, CAST(t1c3fcb1f32313815df18da7f8e31c3cd.rec_yds_from_plays AS DECIMAL) / NULLIF(CAST(tffa4ec673b4f60169d1851d9d0099ceb.rate_type_total_count AS DECIMAL), 0) AS "rec_yds_from_plays_0", CAST(t07addadcba8ab806b865cf1a15960ae2.rec_yds_from_plays AS DECIMAL) / NULLIF(CAST(td7c3e33ca21a03aa3317f8fa7968a99b.rate_type_total_count AS DECIMAL), 0) AS "rec_yds_from_plays_1", "player"."pos" from "player" left join "tffa4ec673b4f60169d1851d9d0099ceb" on "tffa4ec673b4f60169d1851d9d0099ceb"."pid" = "player"."pid" left join "td7c3e33ca21a03aa3317f8fa7968a99b" on "td7c3e33ca21a03aa3317f8fa7968a99b"."pid" = "player"."pid" left join "t1c3fcb1f32313815df18da7f8e31c3cd" on "t1c3fcb1f32313815df18da7f8e31c3cd"."pid" = "player"."pid" left join "t07addadcba8ab806b865cf1a15960ae2" on "t07addadcba8ab806b865cf1a15960ae2"."pid" = "player"."pid" group by tffa4ec673b4f60169d1851d9d0099ceb.rate_type_total_count, "t1c3fcb1f32313815df18da7f8e31c3cd"."rec_yds_from_plays", tffa4ec673b4f60169d1851d9d0099ceb.rate_type_total_count, "t07addadcba8ab806b865cf1a15960ae2"."rec_yds_from_plays", td7c3e33ca21a03aa3317f8fa7968a99b.rate_type_total_count, "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 3 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
